project.name: Solar Predictor Group Project
project.timeline: Completed by group of four in one week
project.description: Uses a weather and a solar panel API to correlate energy production and make predictions about the next week.

project.name: Actualize Yourself Group Project
project.timeline: Completed by group of four in one week
project.description: Uses express and MySQL to keep track of user's stated goals.

project.name: Elite 4 Group Project
project.timeline: Completed by group of four in one week
project.description: MERN application hosting a realtime multiplayer game.

project.name: Sumdoku Solver
project.description: TDD project to solve normal both normal and math-based sudoku puzzles.

project.name: Bogglr
project.description: Word creation game tested with Python Selenium.

project.name: Giphy Displayer
project.description: Displays gifs related to specific words, and allows users to add their own words.

project.name: Elementary Hangman Game
project.description: Quick, repeating game that keeps track of user guesses, displaying whatever portions of the word they've already found. The word is chosen from an array of nautical terms.

project.name: Math Game Using Randomization
project.description: Asks user to figure out unknown values through experimentation and use them to sum a specific number.
